using namespace std;
#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stdlib.h>

int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	int n,i;
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		int win[51]={0},tie[51]={0},score[51]={0};
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		scanf("%d",&win[i]);
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
		scanf("%d",&tie[i]);
		score[i]=(win[i]*3)+tie[i];
		}
		sort(score,score+n+1);
		printf("%d\n",score[n]);
	}
}
